data.actual_result: Image is uploaded and compressed as an emoji i.e. :emoji_##: and is cropped to a square.
data.expected_result: Should say file too big, or not accept the image.
data.short_description: Testflight allows uploads of images above file size
data.steps_to_repro: - Upload any image from your phone, like a selfie or screenshot - See as it is made into an emote
